Hi and this is the file report :

251 mb reduced on the original iso with the game intact and all the quality , the original iso had 1.19 Gb and dropped to 939 mb that after the 7zip compression getted the final 437 mb of the file .

This game have an iso with the game data in a cpk archive file that was extracted correctly and the necessary ripping quality work maded after that on the archive to finally make a perfect repacker of the archive , the sensation i get when i finish the work was that i did absolutly the same steps or very similar to the guy that maked the original iso , so getting this worked iso with the cpk archive worked , it was just like getting the original and them i get the sense of the work well done in what was possible once more ...

This is a kind of an adventure game that once you start playing you probably get involved on the game story just like any other game and once you start playing the game comes addictive enough to keep going on the story ...

Happy adventure game to all of you .
